name: Diplomat's Pack
content:
Includes:

• a chest

• 2 cases for maps and scrolls

• a set of fine clothes

• a bottle of ink

• an ink pen

• a lamp

• 2 flasks of oil

• 5 sheets of paper

• a vial of perfume

• sealing wax

• soap.
